mapper.select: select /*+ product.list */ PROD_YMD, PROD_NO, MEM_ID, PROD_CODE, PROD_NAME, PROD_PRICE, PROD_USE_YN, PROD_ETC, PROD_REG_DATE, PROD_UPD_DATE FROM hair_product where MEM_ID like '%'||#{mem_id}||'%' order by PROD_upd_date desc, PROD_no desc
select /*+ product.listCnt */ count(*) cnt FROM hair_product where MEM_ID like '%'||#{mem_id}||'%'
mapper.insert: insert into /*+ product.write */ hair_product ( PROD_YMD ,prod_no , MEM_ID , prod_code , prod_name , prod_price , prod_use_yn , PROD_ETC , prod_reg_date , prod_upd_date ) value ( DATE_FORMAT(sysdate(), '%Y%m%d') ,(select a.prod_no from(select IFNULL(MAX(prod_no) + 1, 1) prod_no from hair_product) a ) , #{mem_id} , 'P0001' , #{prod_name} , #{prod_price} , #{prod_use_yn} , #{prod_etc} , now() , now() )
